item.description:
Lets get some people together in the Somerville area to watch the half pipe finals in the Olympics.

Right now we only have a few so lets hang out at my Apt, I have a large TV. BYOB, same thing for food. It looks like the coverage will run from 8:30 to 11:30. Different sports will be mixed in including Lindsey Vonn attempt at gold in the Womens downhill.

If we get a large turnout we will move the "The Precinct Bar" which is walking distance from my apt.
item.how_to_find_us: doorbell does not work. Just knock on door, my living room is near the front door.
item.name: Mens Half Pipe - Olympics
